name: Rabbit Run (itch) (Work in Progress)
description:
Rabbit Run is an infinite runner developed by Work In Progress for Global Game Jam 2023.

Complete fast minigames to dodge, jump or duck your way through obstacles to outrun the giant fox chasing close behind you and beat your high score!

The game has a colourful pixel art style and catchy music to go perfectly with it's fast paced arcade-like gameplay and  stylish animations.
